summary.span: 提供對於用戶端瀏覽器功能詳細資料的存取。

span.span: Provides access to detailed information about the capabilities of the client's browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底類別，從其中類別衍生。 is the base class from which the class is derived. 提供大量的唯讀屬性，可提供瀏覽器的功能字典的型別安全存取。 offers a large number of read-only properties that provide type-safe access to a browser's capabilities dictionary. 您可以存取類別透過ASP.NET 所公開的屬性屬性。You can access the class through the property that is exposed by the ASP.NET property. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何存取瀏覽器的相關資訊。The following example shows how to access information about the browser. remarks.format: ## Remarks HTTP 是無狀態的通訊協定，以及`VIEWSTATE`是一個用來保存跨多個要求的用戶端變更的機制。HTTP is a stateless protocol, and `VIEWSTATE` is one mechanism used to persist client changes across multiple requests. 在網頁上的每個控制項包含屬性，代表用戶端所做的任何變更的累積。Each control on a Web page contains a property, which represents the accumulation of any changes made by the client. 在 Web Form 頁面中，這些變更會在回傳資料做為編碼`value`之 html``具有項目`type`屬性`hidden`。In a Web Forms page, these changes are encoded in postback data as the `value` of an HTML `` element with a `type` attribute of `hidden`. 例如: For example: ``` ``` 如果`true`、 非字母字元在`VIEWSTATE`值將不會傳送正確的瀏覽器中，也不中繼閘道。 若要修正此問題，伺服器控制項配接器會取代中的非字母字元`VIEWSTATE`最不需要在 HTTP 要求中的編碼方式的值。To correct this, server-control adapters replace non-alphabetic characters in the `VIEWSTATE` value with ones that do not require encoding in HTTP requests. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何判斷瀏覽器是否需要`VIEWSTATE`進行特殊編碼的值。The following code example shows how to determine whether the browser requires `VIEWSTATE` values to be specially encoded. remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的值可以取自假設的字元大小與實際畫面像素大小。The returned value can be derived from the assumed character size and actual screen pixel size. 決定高度的演算法會使用預設字型大小 （從.config 檔案）、 特定瀏覽器的大小 （同樣從.config 檔案中），以及明確瀏覽器所傳送的標頭的組合。The algorithm for determining the height uses a combination of the default font sizes (from a .config file), browser-specific sizes (again, from a .config file), and explicit headers sent by the browser. 某些瀏覽器可能依賴內部預設值，只是大約實際的高度。Some browsers might rely on internal default values, which only approximate the actual height.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `cache-control`值`http-equiv`屬性的 HTML``項目可讓您控制透過用戶端的快取下載的內容，其中包含 Web 網頁。The `cache-control` value for the `http-equiv` attribute of HTML `` elements allows control over client caching of downloaded content, which includes Web pages. 下列 HTML 片段會顯示範例：The following HTML fragment shows an example: ``` ``` 如果`true`，在此標記包含``網頁的項目應強制瀏覽器以重新載入來自伺服器的內容。If `true`, the inclusion of this tag in the `` element of a Web page should force the browser to reload content from the server. 如果`false`，預設查詢字串附加伺服器控制配接器 (`__ufps=``uniquefilepathsuffix`) 到還沒有其中一個連結 URL 值。If `false`, server control adapters append a default query string (`__ufps=``uniquefilepathsuffix`) onto link URL values that do not already have one. 這會強制重新載入來自伺服器的內容瀏覽器。This forces the browser to reload content from the server. 屬性亦套用於對等的 HTTP 標頭格式：The property also applies to the equivalent HTTP header form: ``` CACHE-CONTROL: NO-CACHE ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何判斷瀏覽器是否支援`cache-control`值`http-equiv`屬性的 HTML``項目。The following code example shows how to determine whether the browser supports the `cache-control` value for the `http-equiv` attribute of HTML `` elements.
